description: The AWS::MemoryDB::ParameterGroup resource creates an Amazon MemoryDB ParameterGroup.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Name.description: The name of the parameter group.

Family.description: The engine and version family for the parameter group.

Description.description: A user supplied description for the parameter group.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this parameter group.

Parameters.description: An map of parameter names and values for the parameter update. You must supply at least one parameter name and value; subsequent arguments are optional.

ARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parameter group.
